sen.e: Choken (1126-September 12, 1203) was a Buddhist priest of the Tendai sect who lived from the late Heian period to the beginning of the Kamakura period.

sen.e: According to "Gyokuyo" (Diary of FUJIWARA no Kanezane), Choken did adultery with the Imperial Princess Shushi who was the Chugu (Empress) of the Emperor Nijo, and Kaie the apprentice of Choken was a son between Choken and the Imperial Princess Shushi.
